name: Shapes (itch) (rhythmiq)
description:
A short platformer game where the hero Rekt goes to a journey to save Her. This is still a prototype of the game and would love to have feedback to make the game better and continue development.

Instructions:

1. Press Space to jump

2. Left and Right Arrow keys to move

This game is developed by @kebinyee. Visit us @ http://www.rhythmiq.io/
